item.description:
Saludos,

Planning an event for Lunch in Brookline Village.

Location: Orinoco Restaurant at Brookline Village

November 10th

Time: 12:00 Noon

This event is for all speakers.

You could drive in and find meter parking near around the restaurant. But, it can be accessed by Green D Line (Brookline Village Station) and E line (Riverway Station) and short walk, or by #39, #60, #65, and #66 buses.

 

Note: The restaurant Lunch hours are from 12noon to 2:30pm; please plan to arrive earlier.

 

http://www.orinocokitchen.com/about.html

 

 

Want to limit to 15 people.

 

 

Ernesto
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group talking Spanish at the left side of the restaurant

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Almuerzo en Orinoco (Brookline Village)
